awd_titl_txt: Frequency Domain Inverse Methods for Electrocardiography
awd_abstract_narration: This is a novel electrical/computer engineering approach to a                   difficult problem of determining disease states of the heart                    from EKGs.  A new era is emerging, namely, that of "smart                       computers", ie., computers that have sufficiently large CPUs                    (central processing units) that the ability to make "judgments"                 can be programmed.  This proposal utilizes this capability to                   "make judgments" on the physical condition of the heart from                    voltage measurements on the skin, ie., an EKG. It is clear that                 this is a high-risk high-gain research proposal.  If successful,                this type of research could revolutionize diagnosis in                          cardiology.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
